## Observation notes  
First documented by Ibsen 1916, with extensive historical record in the Pacific Maritime. Tommasi et al. 2004: <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Greater <span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span></span> Area</span>. Ratti et al. 2008: <span class="hl-place-name">Fraser Valley</span>. Guzman et al., 2023: 2005; 2007; 2009; 2012; 2014, 2015; 2015; 2017, <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>. 2011, <span class="hl-place-name">Lower Mainland</span>; 2015, <span class="hl-place-name">Abbotsford</span>. NBSBC Bee Atlas Database: 2021, 2022, 2023; 2022; 2023, <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>. iNaturalist: <span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name"><span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span> Is</span>land</span>, <span class="hl-place-name">Gulf Islands</span>, Metro <span class="hl-place-name">Vancouver</span>, <span class="hl-place-name">Fraser Valley</span>, <span class="hl-place-name">Squamish</span>, from 2011.
